name: Magic Charge Duet
description:
Magic Charge Duet is a Japanese Anime style visual novel game about a fantasy adventure story of you getting transported to another world.



Amazing CG Animation: Charging magic power to girls with your SPECIAL SKILL !

Cute Character Voice: Enjoy the story unfold of two main characters !

Game Overview


You passed out caused of archiving the legendary level called Technical Break with too much masturbation. When you opened your eyes again, you were in another unknown world … !
It seems you were summoned by a witch as a familiar, withholding special amazing rare skills!
'Eh!?...... My sperm is the condition for activating the strongest recovery skill!?'
This is the time to fuck and enjoy your adventure with the cute witch and give her all your sperm!

Travels with a witch who wants your semen and sex with a succubus! and also enjoy the fantastic time with therianthrope girl.
The new story is waiting for you in this fantasy world!

Character




Letty Lillia

The continent's top magician.
Her elegance befits her from a noble background, but she tends to look down on those around her because of her magic abilities and is stubborn and bullish.

She also has a daring side that even doing naughty things to collect your sperm for active special skills for recovering her magic power.



Luna Mijuru

She is toying with human men with her seduction skills.
Coming to meet you secretly by hearing rumors about your sperm is the source of making Holy Water.

Excellent Sperm is her target to give birth to a nice baby.
A lascivious succubus who loves sex even using you as a toy to satisfy her desires.

Language Supported


English, Japanese, Traditional Chinese
